Variables

$support-legacy 

$support-legacy: true !global;

Description

Defines whether the lib should support legacy browsers (e.g. IE 8).

Type

Bool

Value

true

Since

0.3.9

TODO's

  • Nothing. It's awesome.

[Deprecated] $i 

$i: 0 !global;

Description

Defines the number of iteration.

Type

Number

Value

0

first 

@function first ($list) { ... }

Description

Returns first element of $list

Example

$list: (1, 2, 3, 4);
$first: first($list);
// -> 1
$list: 1;
$first: first($list);
// -> 1

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list

list to retrieve first item from

 List —

Returns

Any

Throws

  • Cannot find first item of empty list.

slice 

@function slice ($list, $start: 1, $end: length($list) { ... }

Description

Slices $list between $start and $end

Parameters

Name Description Type Default value
$list

list to slice

 List —
$start

start index

 Number 1
$end

) - end index

 Number length($list

Returns

List , bool

Throws

  • List indexes $start and $end must be numbers for slice.

  • Start index has to be lesser than or equals to the end index for slice.

  • List indexes must be non-zero integers for slice.

  • Start index has to be lesser than or equal to list length for slice.

  • End index has to be lesser than or equal to list length for slice.

Used by

  • tail

Description

 List —

 String —

 Arglist —
